name: IN-HEH Timeline Workspace
summary: Learn about .IHW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: IHW files can be loaded by Timeline to recall saved user workspace settings or to switch to another workspace.

description: Saved workspace for IN-HEH Timeline, a program that creates historical and genealogy databases; stores view options such window sizes and positions as well as filters used for filtering what event data is displayed.
